Jazz, the American Invention #2: Three Generations of Jazz Piano - Roland Hanna, Eubie Blake, Danny Mixon (Tape 2 of 2)
Jazz, the American Invention #2: Three Generations of Jazz Piano - Roland Hanna, Eubie Blake, Danny Mixon (Tape 2 of 2)
Performers on this recording include Eubie Blake, Roland Hanna, and Danny Mixon.

Original format: 1/2 inch open reel video; Transfer Technician Notes: "Content generally plays very well. There are several instances of image errors, notably when there is an abrupt shift in lighting. There is also mild image distortion, similar to bearding or jitter throughout. These artifacts are introduced by the TBC, but was determined to be the best possible capture when compared to errors presented by other TBCs. Otherwise, the content plays without major error."
